```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(here)
```

```{r}
ca_np <- read_csv(here("data", "ca_np.csv"))
```
```{r}
ci_np <- read_excel(here("data", "ci_np.xlsx"))
```

```{r}
gg_base <- ggplot(data = ci_np, aes(x = year, y = visitors))
```

```{r}
gg_base +
  geom_point(aes(
    size = visitors,
    color = visitors),
    alpha = 0.8,

  )
```

```{r data}
gg_base +
  geom_point(
    aes(size = visitors,
        color = visitors),
    alpha = 0.5
  ) +
  theme_linedraw()
```
